removeDynamicLeaf

public void removeDynamicLeaf(String name)
Remove an existing dynamic leaf from the dynamic document definition
if no leaf with the given name is found or if the leaf is not a dynamic leaf, no changes will be made

Parameters:
name - Name of an existing dynamic leaf
